attributes.action: Make the sale and use of Spice illegal as soon as possible!
attributes.additional_details:
This is Vice documentary that follows the homeless who take Spice in Manchester. 

The Hard Lives of Britains Synthetic Marijuana Addicts:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t6pmc7Tpx4w

With a quick Google search you can find UK based online store that sell the drug that cost between £10 - £15.
attributes.background: A recent Vice documentary has shown the devastating effects of Spice when taken. Its easily obtained in shops and online and is cheaper and more addictive than other drugs. It needs to be banned now!
